__bundle_register("Checker White.949147.lua", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
require("Bohnanza.Helpers")

ZONE_TEMPLATE = "d6852c"

SOY_DECK = "3e8500"
BLACK_DECK = "0bd6af"
GARDEN_DECK = "11fc02"
RED_DECK = "fc4f11"
COCOA_DECK = "d228c8"
WAX_DECK = "ea02cd"
CHILI_DECK = "1e490c"
GREEN_DECK = "f2d49c"
COFFEE_DECK = "8e8d4e"
BLUE_DECK = "f3a88f"
STINK_DECK = "a7bf33"

DRAW_DECK = ""
DISCARD_ZONE = "264205"

ALL_COLORS = {"orange", "red", "brown", "white", "yellow", "pink", "purple"}

CONTROLS = {
  orange = {
    counter = "53de1e",
    fields = {
      left = "f0c909",
      center = "2ca1cb",
      right = "e5519d"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "edfc21",
      center = "e39338",
      right = "e89dde"
    }
  },
  red = {
    counter = "26eb07",
    fields = {
      left = "c72440",
      center = "0ec208",
      right = "baf2c9"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "326808",
      center = "74bc5f",
      right = "540406"
    }
  },
  brown = {
    counter = "721c43",
    fields = {
      left = "16e303",
      center = "2d1fb6",
      right = "f2f243"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "b8b1fb",
      center = "820707",
      right = "d82e1b"
    }
  },
  white = {
    counter = "722c39",
    fields = {
      left = "09d1b6",
      center = "bf1403",
      right = "ede488"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "3e4467",
      center = "8594ed",
      right = "eee6ba"
    }
  },
  yellow = {
    counter = "f68a32",
    fields = {
      left = "956d84",
      center = "c85946",
      right = "cdd915"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "789551",
      center = "6eab5b",
      right = "34e460"
    }
  },
  purple  = {
    counter = "922e20",
    fields = {
      left = "eafd7f",
      center = "254cb4",
      right = "37c672"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "c7c272",
      center = "5bf04a",
      right = "34ec4e"
    }
  },
  pink  = {
    counter = "790265",
    fields = {
      left = "6bbca0",
      center = "7f1b96",
      right = "f55151"
    },
    zones = {
      left = "2c18c5",
      center = "6e7b9f",
      right = "415e10"
    }
  },
}

local state = {
    organized = false,
    gameStarted = false,
    numPlayers = 0,
    variantEnabled = false,
    activeColors = {}
}

DEBUG = true

function getTurnOrder(players, startIndex)
  local turnOrder = {}
  local turnIndex = 1
  for i = startIndex, #players, 1 do
    turnOrder[turnIndex] = string.lower(players[i])
    turnIndex = turnIndex + 1
  end
  for i = 1, startIndex - 1, 1 do
    turnOrder[turnIndex] = string.lower(players[i])
    turnIndex = turnIndex + 1
  end
  return turnOrder
end

function toggleVariant()
  local enabledColor = self.UI.getAttribute("toggleBtn", "color")
  local enabled = enabledColor ~= "#00ff00"

  log("Variant is now "..ternary(enabled, "enabled", "disabled"))
  state["variantEnabled"] = enabled
  self.UI.setAttribute("toggleBtn", "color", ternary(enabled, "#00ff00", "#ff0000"))
end

function startGame()
  state["gameStarted"] = true
  self.UI.setAttribute("setupPanel", "active", "false")
  self.UI.setAttribute("gamePanel", "active", "true")

  if DEBUG then
     for _,color in ipairs(ALL_COLORS) do
       state["activeColors"] = table.insert(state["activeColors"], color)
     end
   else
     local players = getSeatedPlayers()
     for _,c in ipairs(players) do
       local color = string.lower(c)
       state["activeColors"] = table.insert(state["activeColors"], color)
     end
   end

  local i = math.random(1, #state["activeColors"])
  local firstPlayer = state["activeColors"][i]
  broadcastToAll(capitalize(firstPlayer).." will go first!")
  Turns.turn_color = capitalize(firstPlayer)

  local numPlayers = #getSeatedPlayers()
  state["numPlayers"] = numPlayers

  if state["variantEnabled"] then
    new_deck = getObjectFromGUID(SOY_DECK)
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(BLACK_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(RED_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(WAX_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(CHILI_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(GREEN_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(BLUE_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(STINK_DECK))

    if numPlayers == 2 then
      new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(COFFEE_DECK))
      getObjectFromGUID(GARDEN_DECK).destruct()
      getObjectFromGUID(COCOA_DECK).destruct()
    elseif numPlayers == 3 then
      new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(COFFEE_DECK))
      new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(GARDEN_DECK))
      getObjectFromGUID(COCOA_DECK).destruct()
    elseif numPlayers == 4 or numPlayers == 5 then
      new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(GARDEN_DECK))
      new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(COCOA_DECK))
      getObjectFromGUID(COFFEE_DECK).destruct()
    else
      new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(COFFEE_DECK))
      getObjectFromGUID(GARDEN_DECK).destruct()
      getObjectFromGUID(COCOA_DECK).destruct()
    end

    new_deck.shuffle()
    new_deck.flip()
    new_deck.lock()
    DRAW_DECK = new_deck.getGUID()
    Wait.frames(function()
      new_deck.setPositionSmooth(self.getPosition(), false, false)
    end, 280)
  else
    new_deck = getObjectFromGUID(SOY_DECK)
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(BLACK_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(GARDEN_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(RED_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(COCOA_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(WAX_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(CHILI_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(GREEN_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(COFFEE_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(BLUE_DECK))
    new_deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(STINK_DECK))
    new_deck.shuffle()
    new_deck.flip()
    new_deck.lock()
    new_deck.setTags({"deck"})
    DRAW_DECK = new_deck.getGUID()
    Wait.frames(function()
      new_deck.setPositionSmooth(self.getPosition() + vector(0, 1, 0), false, false)
    end, 280)
  end
end

function flipDisplay()
  draw_deck = getObjectFromGUID(DRAW_DECK)
  card1 = draw_deck.takeObject()
  card1.setPositionSmooth(self.getPosition() + vector(35, 0, 0), false, false)
  card2 = draw_deck.takeObject()
  card2.setPositionSmooth(self.getPosition() + vector(65, 0, 0), false, false)
  Wait.frames(function()
      card1.flip()
      card2.flip()
  end, 15)
end

function spawnPlayers()
  template = getObjectFromGUID(ZONE_TEMPLATE)
  for _, color in ipairs(ALL_COLORS) do
    player = getPlayer(color)
    tClone = template.clone()
    tClone.setScale({4.5, 4.5, 4.5})
    if player.color == "Orange" or player.color == "Pink" then
      if player.color == "Orange" then
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(-82, 0, -18))
        tClone.setRotation({0, -90, 0})
      else
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(73, 0, -18))
        tClone.setRotation({0, 90, 0})
      end
      t2 = tClone.clone()
      t2.setPosition(tClone.getPosition() + vector(0, 0, -10))
      t3 = tClone.clone()
      t3.setPosition(tClone.getPosition() + vector(0, 0, 10))
      zone1 = spawnObject({
        type              = 'ScriptingTrigger',
        position          = tClone.getPosition(),
        rotation          = tClone.getRotation(),
        scale             = tClone.getScale()
      })

      zone2 = spawnObject({
        type              = 'ScriptingTrigger',
        position          = t2.getPosition(),
        rotation          = t2.getRotation(),
        scale             = t2.getScale()
      })

      zone3 = spawnObject({
        type              = 'ScriptingTrigger',
        position          = t3.getPosition(),
        rotation          = t3.getRotation(),
        scale             = t3.getScale()
      })
    else
      if player.color == "White" then
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(-3, 0, -63))
      elseif player.color == "Brown" then
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(-37, 0, -63))
      elseif player.color == "Red" then
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(-74, 0, -63))
      elseif player.color == "Purple" then
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(66, 0, -63))
      elseif player.color == "Yellow" then
        tClone.setPosition(self.getPosition() + vector(32, 0, -63))
      end
      t2 = tClone.clone()
      t2.setPosition(tClone.getPosition() + vector(-10, 0, 0))
      t3 = tClone.clone()
      t3.setPosition(tClone.getPosition() + vector(10, 0, 0))

      zone1 = spawnObject({
        type              = 'ScriptingTrigger',
        position          = tClone.getPosition(),
        rotation          = tClone.getRotation(),
        scale             = tClone.getScale()
      })

      zone2 = spawnObject({
        type              = 'ScriptingTrigger',
        position          = t2.getPosition(),
        rotation          = t2.getRotation(),
        scale             = t2.getScale()
      })

      zone3 = spawnObject({
        type              = 'ScriptingTrigger',
        position          = t3.getPosition(),
        rotation          = t3.getRotation(),
        scale             = t3.getScale()
      })
    end

  end
end

function deckEmpty()
  self.UI.setAttribute("flipBtn", "active", false)
  self.UI.setAttribute("shuffleBtn", "active", true)
end

function shuffleDeck()
  new_deck = getObjectFromGUID(DISCARD_ZONE).getObjects(false)[1]

  new_deck.shuffle()
  new_deck.flip()
  new_deck.lock()
  new_deck.setTags({"deck"})
  DRAW_DECK = new_deck.getGUID()

  Wait.frames(function()
    new_deck.setPositionSmooth(self.getPosition() + vector(0, 1, 0), false, false)
    self.UI.setAttribute("flipBtn", "active", true)
    self.UI.setAttribute("shuffleBtn", "active", false)
  end, 280)
end

function onSave()
    log("Saving...")

    return JSON.encode(state)
end

function onLoad(save)
    if #save > 0 then
        local s = JSON.decode(save)
        state = s
        if s["numPlayers"] > 0 then
            self.UI.setAttribute("setupPanel", "active", "false")
            self.UI.setAttribute("gamePanel", "active", "true")
        end
    end
end
end)
__bundle_register("Bohnanza.Helpers", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
function capitalize(str)
  return string.upper(string.sub(str, 1, 1))..string.sub(str, 2)
end

function ternary(cond , T, F)
  if cond then return T else return F end
end

function getPlayer(color)
  players = Player.getPlayers()
  for _, player in ipairs(players) do
    if string.lower(color) == string.lower(player.color) then
      return player
    end
  end
end

function refreshcount(zone)
  local count = 0
  for i, lobj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
      if lobj.type == "Card" then
        count = count + 1
      elseif lobj.type == "Deck" then
        count = count + #lobj.getObjects()
      end
  end

  return count
end
end)
return __bundle_require("Checker White.949147.lua")

        counter.call("setCenterValue", {value = refreshcount(zone)})
